languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g}, применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, перемещает любую цель, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в количестве, равном половине расстояния, которое преодолела цель. Если это произошло в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} другого персонажа, офицер получает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на следующий ход.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Leader's ability moves any target, the Leader gains movement points equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's turn, the Leader will gain these movement points on their next turn.

Whenever the Leader's ability moves any target, the Leader gains movement points equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's turn, the Leader will gain these movement points on their next turn.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g}, применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, перемещает любую цель, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в количестве, равном половине расстояния, которое преодолела цель. Если это произошло в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} другого персонажа, офицер получает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на следующий ход.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Когда лидер, применяя способность, перемещает любую цель, он получает ОП в количестве, равном половине расстояния, которое преодолела цель. Если это произошло в ход другого персонажа, лидер получит ОП на следующий ход.

Когда лидер, применяя способность, перемещает любую цель, он получает ОП в количестве, равном половине расстояния, которое преодолела цель. Если это произошло в ход другого персонажа, лидер получит ОП на следующий ход.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}让任何目标移动时，军官都会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，相当于该目标移动距离的一半。如果该名目标未在军官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内移动，军官会将这些额外的移动点数保留至下个回合。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.

traits.locale_text: 每当领袖使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}让任何目标移动时，领袖都会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，相当于该目标移动距离的一半。如果该名目标未在领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内移动，领袖则会将这些额外的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}保留至下个回合。

languages.text: Cada vez que una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} desplace a un objetivo, el oficial gana tantos {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} como la mitad de la distancia recorrida por el objetivo desplazado. Si esto ocurre durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de otro personaje, el oficial gana estos puntos de movimiento en su próximo turno.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} del oficial desplace a un objetivo, el oficial gana tantos {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} como la mitad de la distancia recorrida por el objetivo desplazado. Si esto ocurre durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de otro personaje, el oficial gana estos puntos de movimiento en su próximo turno.

languages.text: Immer wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g} ein beliebiges Ziel bewegt, erhält der Offizier {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} in Höhe der halben Distanz, die sich das Ziel bewegt hat. Geschieht dies im {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eines anderen Charakters, erhält der Offizier diese Bewegungspunkte in seinem nächsten Zug.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Offiziers ein beliebiges Ziel bewegt, erhält der Offizier {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} in Höhe der halben Distanz, die sich das Ziel bewegt hat. Geschieht dies im {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eines anderen Charakters, erhält der Offizier diese Bewegungspunkte in seinem nächsten Zug.

languages.text: Chaque fois que la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} déplace une cible, l'officier gagne un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} égal à la moitié de la distance parcourue par la cible. Lorsque cela se produit pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} d'un autre personnage, l'officier bénéficie de ces points de déplacement lors de son tour suivant.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} du Leader déplace une cible, le Leader gagne un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} égal à la moitié de la distance parcourue par la cible. Lorsque cela se produit pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} d'un autre personnage, le Leader bénéficie de ces {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} lors de son tour suivant.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}がターゲットを移動させた時、オフィサーはそのターゲットが移動した距離の半分に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を得る。この効果が他のキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に発動した場合、オフィサーは次のターンで移動ポイントを得る。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.

traits.locale_text: リーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}がターゲットを移動させた時、リーダーはそのターゲットが移動した距離の半分に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を得る。この効果が他のキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に発動した場合、リーダーは次のターンで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を得る。
